EZ method to calc potential lifespan
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher 2 Archive (PSOne): Raising/Training Tips: EZ method to calc potential lifespan
By QED on Friday, October 27, 2000 - 08:59 am:

The method most people use to calculate potential lifespans of monster combinations is unnecessarily cumbersome. I’m referring to the difference in “levels” times + or (-) 20 weeks method.

An easier way is this: 60% of primary breed lifespan plus 40% of sub-breed lifespan. That’s it. Simple and it works every time, (do the math).

QED
